286046.「おおっ！ ツリーの飾りつけは\n バッチリじゃねえか！: Oh! The Tree is all decorated!

286047.「……だが まだ ほかの準備は\n 完璧ってワケじゃあ なさそうだな。:
But I'm not sure I'm ready for the rest of it
yet.

286048.「うーん……惜しいモン。ごちそうの準備も\n まだみたいだし あと ちょーっと\:
Well...that's a shame. They haven't prepared
the feast yet, and there's still a little work
to be done.

286049.「おーい！ アンタたち ヒマか！？\n もし 手が空いているようだったら オレの:
Hey! You guys free? If you're free, you can
help me with my work.

286050.「オレ 調子に乗ってたみたいでよぉ。\n ひとりじゃ さばけない量の仕事を\n:
I was in a good mood. I was taking on more
work than I could handle on my own.

286051.「だから 誰か 手の空いてるヤツに\n オレの分の星夜祭の仕事を 手伝ってほしい:
So I'm hoping someone who has some free time will help me with my portion of the Hoshi Yoru Festival work, but it seems like everyone has
too much to do.

286052.「オレは あっちで準備をしてるから\n 気が向いたら 手伝ってくれよ。なっ！:
I'm getting ready over there, so help me out
if you feel like it. Hey!

286053.「あの 慌てよう……よっぽど困っているんだな。\n お前さん よかったら アイツ:
He must be in a panic...he must be in a lot of
trouble. If you don't mind, could you help him
out?

286054.「僕も それがいいと思うモン！ みんなでやれば\n 星夜祭の準備も すぐに終わる:
I think that's a good idea! If we all work together, the preparations for the Starry Night Festival will be over soon! I want to
help out too, if I can!

286055.「ああ～っ！ ちょっと待って ほしいモン！\n まだ キミの願望を かなえてあげ:
Aaahhh! Wait a minute! I want you to wait a
minute! I haven't given you what you wanted
yet!

286056.「今から キミに魔法をかけてあげるモン～！\n モンモン～～ モシャス～ン！！:
Now I'm going to cast a spell on you! Monsieur
Monsieur Morphin!

286057.「みんな 楽しそうにしてるじゃねえか。: You guys look like you're having a good time.

286058.「<pc>……お前さんのおかげで\n 無事に 星夜祭が 始められたぜ。\n これ:
...Thanks to you, we were able to start the Starry Night Festival without a hitch. This is a thank you from me. Please
accept it.

286059.「それにしても 魔物たちが こんなに\n 一生懸命やってくれるなんてな。\n 星:
I can't believe the monsters are working so
hard. I'm sure you'll have fun with me at the
Starry Night Festival.
